Package org.ingatan.component.text

Text field and text area classes that have been tweaked to incoroporate the symbol menu.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DataTable A JTable based table supporting dynamic resizing, swapping of data columns, and addition of rows, etc.
EmbeddedGraphic Interface for embedded graphics returned by the ImageAcquisitionDialog.
EmbeddedImage A JPanel which displays an image.
EmbeddedMathTeX A JPanel which displays rendered JMathTeX.
GeneralRichTextTransferHandler A general transfer handler for the RichTextArea.
JMathTeXField A panel for entering and previewing JMathTeX strings.
NumericJTextField A number only extension of the JTextField.
RichTextArea An extension of the JTextPane, the rich text area includes an instance of RichTextToolbar, which allows for easy formatting.
RichTextToolbar Provides the GUI for a rich text editor toolbar.
SimpleTextArea This class is a simple extension of the JTextArea component, but with the addition of a SymbolMenu.
SimpleTextField An extension of JTextField, but with a SymbolMenu.
SymbolMenu Provides a symbol menu which may be used as an inline menu for JTextComponents.
 

Package org.ingatan.component.text Description

Text field and text area classes that have been tweaked to incoroporate the symbol menu. A RichTextArea field that can serialise and deserialise to String value was also created with simple markup. This allows for answer fields, embedded math text and embedded images to be serialised in a nice way.
